Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] heritrix cluster controller and hadoop DFS
 writer process

'Heritrix Cluster Controller' is only for H1.

The Hadoop DFS writer is an outside project; you should check with its 
website/contributors. There was some mention on the list a while back 
suggesting someone had it working with H3.

- Gordon @ IA

On 11/26/10 3:43 AM, Mohammad Amin Golshani wrote:
>
>
> hi all
> in HERITRIX web site, in raleted project partition, i saw two
> interesting projects, heritrix cluster controller and hadoop DFS writer
> process,
> i want to know these projects only work with herotrix 3.0.0 or i can use
> them with heritrix 1.14.4.
